data.message: Aurora V3.5 Edge Fade - Contained and Smooth: Created aurora gradient effect with: 1) Small circle touching edge of big circle, 2) 100% opacity at touch point fading to 0% inward, 3) All glows contained within parent circle bounds (no leaking), 4) 8 layers for smooth blend, 5) Mirrored exactly between top and bottom circles. Key formula: offset + radius < parent radius (325px).
data.task: Aurora V3.5 Edge Fade - Contained and Smooth
data.outcome: Created aurora gradient effect with: 1) Small circle touching edge of big circle, 2) 100% opacity at touch point fading to 0% inward, 3) All glows contained within parent circle bounds (no leaking), 4) 8 layers for smooth blend, 5) Mirrored exactly between top and bottom circles. Key formula: offset + radius < parent radius (325px).
